City Facilities
===============

### City Owned and Operated Facilities

* Overton City Park – located at the end of Lakshore Dr.
* Overton RV Park – located on Pearl St.

For more information concerning these city facilities please contact City Hall at (903) 834-3171.

### City Hall

The City Hall of Overton is open Monday through Friday, 8:00 A.M. to 4:00 P.M. The city is run by a City Manager form of government. City Council meetings are typically held the 3rd Thursday of every month at 7:00 P.M. at City Hall and are open to the public.

The City of Overton provides water, sewer, garbage, Police, Fire and Ambulance services to residents and business owners. Please contact the city regarding all fees associated with these services.

Republic Services is the contracted service that Overton utilizes for garbage. For any additional information regarding garbage services provided, please contact City Hall (903-834-3171).

Thank you for visiting our website.
City of Overton

![](https://cityofoverton.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/McMillan_Memorial_Library_Overton_TX_IMG_4413.jpg)

McMillan Memorial Library, Overton TX

Established in 1956

The City of Overton RV Park has thirty three (33) spaces equipped with electricity, water & sewer connections for rental on a daily, weekly or monthly rate.  The RV Park is convieniently located near to the Community Center, Overton Golf Course, the City Park, and Overton Lake at the end of Pearl Street.

For more information concerning the RV Park rental spaces, contact Sharon Stuart at
[(903) 574-2963](https://www.google.com/search?q=overton+tx+golf+course&rlz=1C1GCEA_enUS1049US1049&oq=overton+tx+golf+course&aqs=chrome.0.0i355i512j46i175i199i512.3527j0j7&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8#)
.

[RV Rental Application](https://cityofoverton.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/City-of-Overton-RV-Rental-Application.pdf)

[RV Rental Credit Card Authorization Form](https://cityofoverton.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Credit-Card-Authorization-Form-RV-Park.pdf)
(to make payments over the phone)

### [Community Building](https://cityofoverton.com/community-building/)

For more information, call 903-574-2963.

### City Golf Course

Open seven days weekly, weather permitting.  For more information call 903-574-2963.
